name: True SAMURAI vs Samurai Dojo
description:
Be a SAMURAI...
Full localized in English(Screen Shot is not localized.

This is "SAMURAI vs Samurai" of the version to only a dojo only, and this application is the application that minimized file size.
Enjoy the one where putting it up is an RPG-like level-free here.

Keep cutting a ninja and a samurai in a slash free to do 360 degrees!

A chief character is used to cut it in the direction same as swipe when I do swipe to trace screen top right corner quickly.

I can taste distance to handle a sword freely!

A samurai sword fight action to be able to simplify in a short time!
The sum drum sound that the music is up to professional standard!
The sequel is under development hard, too!
If reputation is good, I will add quests in future and plan samuraiserialization.

Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoKipFC_LjFdga3U_8QybjA
Development blog:
http://wabiplant.blogspot.jp
I can fly to the rink from review → App support [when I look fromiPhone].

※I check the operation only in iPhone 5S.
※About any trouble or loss, damage that occurred because of the use of our application, I do not guarantee it at all. Thank you for your understanding beforehand.
- A problem to sound at the same time is given temporarily in Unity without sound effects such as at the time of attacks intending. Because I am going to be improved with the next patch, I implement it on solution.
